sen.j: 定食（ていしょく）は、日本の飲食店において多く見受けられる料理の提供形態。
sen.e: Teishoku (set menu) is a style of serving food frequently found in Japanese restaurants.
Teishoku (set menu) is a style of serving food frequently found in Japanese restaurants.
Teishoku is a style of serving food frequently found in Japanese restaurants.

sen.j: 主となる惣菜に加え、一般的には白飯、味噌汁（あるいはその他のスープ）、漬物（関西地方では、漬物の代わりに塩昆布や昆布の佃煮が使われることもある）などが添えられることで定食の体を成す。
sen.e: As well as the main dish, the set menu usually includes white rice, miso soup or another kind of soup, and pickles, while in Kansai they sometimes serve salted konbu seaweed ora boiled konbu dish instead of the pickles).

As well as the main dish, the set menu usually includes white rice, miso soup or another kind of soup, and pickles, while in Kansai they sometimes serve salted konbu seaweed ora boiled konbu dish instead of the pickles).

As well as the main dish, the set menu usually includes white rice, miso soup or another kind of soup, and pickles, while in Kansai they sometimes serve salted konbu seaweed or boiled konbu dish instead of the pickles.

sen.j: よって、全てのセットメニューが定食に当てはまるわけではない。
sen.e: Therefore this does not mean that all set menu are teishoku.
Therefore this does not mean that all set menu are teishoku.
Therefore this does not mean that all set menu are teishoku.

sen.j: 提供する料理の品数を絞ることで調理の効率が上がるので、一般に個々の料理を単品で頼むより安価であることが多く、学生やサラリーマンに人気が高い。
sen.e: As limiting the variety of dishes served makes cooking more efficient, teishoku are usually cheaper than buying the dishes alone, and are therefore very popular with students and company employees.
As limiting the variety of dishes served makes cooking more efficient, teishoku are usually cheaper than buying the dishes alone, and are therefore very popular with students and company employees.
As limiting the variety of dishes served makes cooking more efficient, teishoku are usually cheaper than buying the dishes alone, and are therefore very popular with students and company employees.

sen.j: 定食を主として提供する飲食店を一般に定食屋、または大衆食堂と呼ぶ。
sen.e: Restaurants mainly offering teishoku (set menus) are generally called 'teishoku-ya' (teishoku restaurant) or local eating places.
Restaurants mainly offering teishoku (set menus) are generally called 'teishoku-ya' (teishoku restaurant) or local eating places.
Restaurants mainly offering teishoku (set menus) are generally called 'teishoku-ya' (teishoku restaurant) or local eating places.

sen.j: オフィス街に位置する居酒屋では、アイドルタイムだった昼食タイムに定食を提供しているところが多い。
sen.e: Many Japanese style bars located in office districts offer teishoku at lunchtime which is otherwise a low turnover time.
Many Japanese style bars located in office districts offer teishoku at lunchtime which is otherwise a low turnover time.
Many Japanese style bars located in office districts offer teishoku at lunchtime which is otherwise a low turnover time.

sen.j: モーニングサービスなどのように、提供時間帯の制限が課せられることはほとんどない。
sen.e: Most do not limit the time that teishoku are offered the way 'morning service' menus are offered only up to a certain time.
Most do not limit the time that teishoku are offered the way 'morning service' menus are offered only up to a certain time.
Most do not limit the time that teishoku are offered the way 'morning service' menus are offered only up to a certain time.

sen.j: 社員食堂や学生食堂でも良く供される。
sen.e: Teishoku are also often offered at company and school cafeterias.
Teishoku are also often offered at company and school cafeterias.
Teishoku are also often offered at company and school cafeterias.
Regional characteristics
Regional characteristics
Regional characteristics

sen.j: 沖縄県の食堂でおかずやツルレイシチャンプルーを単品で注文すると、ご飯と味噌汁が添えられ、結果的に定食の体を成していることが多い。
sen.e: In cafeterias in Okinawa, if a customer orders a side dish or fried bitter melon dish, it will usually come with rice and miso soup, so it is basically like a teishoku.
In cafeterias in Okinawa, if a customer orders a side dish or fried bitter melon dish, it will usually come with rice and miso soup, so it is basically like a teishoku.
In cafeterias in Okinawa prefecture, if a customer orders a side dish or fried bitter melon dish, it will usually come with rice and miso soup, so it is basically like a teishoku.

sen.j: これは、日本本土からの定食文化が定着したものである。
sen.e: This is because the custom has taken root in Okinawa from mainland Japan.
This is because the custom has taken root in Okinawa from mainland Japan.
This is because the custom has taken root in Okinawa from mainland Japan.

sen.j: メニュー表にある「おかず」「みそ汁」「ライス」を注文するとご飯が3杯みそ汁が2杯（大小各1）とおかずが出てくる。
sen.e: If a customer orders a side dish, miso soup and rice, then they will be served with three plates of rice, two dishes of soup (one large and one small) as well as the side dish.
If a customer orders a side dish, miso soup and rice, then they will be served with three plates of rice, two dishes of soup (one large and one small) as well as the side dish.
If a customer orders a side dish, miso soup and rice, then they will be served with three plates of rice, two dishes of soup (one large and one small) as well as the side dish.
